niagara.ndom
Class SAXDOMParser

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      niagara.ndom.SAXDOMParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
DOMParser, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class SAXDOMParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements DOMParser

SAXDOMParser constructs read-only SAXDOM documents from a SAX source

supportsStreaming

public boolean supportsStreaming()
Description copied from interface: DOMParser
Indicates if the implementation supports streaming of documents. That is if the implementation can parse a stream of documents from one input source, or if we need to provide a new input source for each call to parse.

Specified by:
supportsStreaming in interface DOMParser
